t: GLASS,PHILIP - Best of Philip Glass - Amazon.com Music

t: Glass, Philip - Philip Glass: Glassworks - Amazon.com Music
s: This is a complete classic 'Philip Glass' piece of music. He has collaborated on films, with a wide variety of singers etc. There is much to discover, his works being so varied and extensive. ... Heard the tunes on this CD via my public radio station.

t: Glass Ensemble, Philip - Glassworks - Amazon.com Music
s: Record is perfect. Philip Glass sounds even better on vinyl than via mp4s. Whole orchestra can be heard. ... This is so incredibly groundbreaking that it has not aged a day. The CD has a superb sound quality for anyone who is not a vinyl fanatic (myself included).

s: To celebrate the 80th birthday of the legendary American composer, The Complete Sony Recordings is the first ever release of Philip Glass Sony Classical recordings together in a limited-edition box set. The 24-CD set includes the first ever release of Glassworks specially mixed for your personal ...

t: The Ultimate Philip Glass: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
s: I first encountered Philip Glass on the radio and I thought I would like to hear some more of his music and this album seemed like a good place to start. His music has a haunting quality ,it seems to reach inside you and make you want to listen. Each track is beautiful in its own special way . this album begs to be loved and listened to. It is in my opinion well worth investing in a fairly priced doulble cd ...
